title: Restore user dashboard card sizing/typography and add distinct admin settings colors

requirements.text: Update the User Dashboard KPI cards to match the provided screenshot by increasing the KPI title/body font sizes and slightly increasing KPI card vertical sizing (padding/spacing) so the three KPI cards are visually larger and easier to read.

quotes: ইউজার প্যানেলের সেকশন কার্ডের টাইটেল ... লেখাগুলা ছোট হয়ে গেছে এগুলো আরেকটু বড় করতে হবে ... উপরের তিনটা কার্ড আর একটু বড় করে দাও
আমি একটা স্ক্রিনশট দিয়েছি স্ক্রিনশটে সাইজ গুলা যেমন আছে এরকম ভাবে মিলিয়ে দিও

acceptanceCriteria: In the user dashboard KPI area (the 1 full-width card + 2 half-width cards), the title text is visibly larger than the current implementation and matches the relative sizing shown in Screenshot_2026-02-07-05-52-41-812_com.android.chrome.jpg.
The KPI amount text remains prominent and does not overflow or wrap on typical mobile widths.
No KPI card content is clipped; spacing between KPI cards remains consistent.

requirements.text: Reduce the User Dashboard action-tile (4 tiles: Production/Work/Nasta/Payment-Loan) button size by approximately 10% while keeping the tile labels readable, and adjust tile typography so it is not overly small compared to the KPI section.

quotes: এই চারটা কার্ডের বাটন গুলো আরেকটু ছোট করে দাও

acceptanceCriteria: The four user dashboard action tiles are ~10% smaller compared to current (via padding/icon/text adjustments), while still readable on mobile.
Tile labels are larger than the current 'text-[9px]' feel and closer to the screenshot’s legibility, without causing label wrapping for the default labels.
Tiles keep a consistent grid layout (2x2) with even spacing and no overlap.

requirements.text: Increase 'user/friend' related text sizes across the user panel views so they are consistent with the larger dashboard section typography (restore readability similar to the previous section styling).

quotes: ইউজার ফ্রেন্ডের সবগুলা লেখা ছোট হয়ে গেছে লেখাগুলো আরেকটু বড় থাকবে আগের সেকশন এর মত

acceptanceCriteria: User-facing text in user-related sections (where the app shows user/friend information) is increased from the current small sizing and is visually consistent with the updated dashboard typography.
No text truncation/regression is introduced in mobile layout for these sections after font-size increases.

requirements.text: In the Admin panel, apply clear, distinct colors to the System Settings tabs (Branding, Label Edit, Notice, Admin, Section) so each tab/section is visually distinguishable (not appearing merged), matching the intent of the provided screenshot.

quotes: ব্র্যান্ডিং, লেবেলে এডিট, নোটিশ, এডমিন, সেকশন এ প্রত্যেকটা কালার দিয়ে দিবে যেন বোঝা যায় এগুলা আলাদাভাবে আছে এখন বোঝা যায় সবগুলা একসাথে আছে

acceptanceCriteria: In System Settings, each tab trigger has a distinct color identity (background and/or text/border) that clearly differentiates it from the other tabs.
The active tab state remains clearly visible and accessible (sufficient contrast) for each tab color.
Tab layout remains usable on mobile (no overlap; labels remain readable).

requirements.text: Add attractive, non-gray colors to Admin panel primary action buttons (Save/Submit/Add) in Settings and Rate sections, and audit other admin sections to ensure their primary action buttons are not colorless; choose cohesive colors that match the existing gradients/theme.

quotes: এডমিন প্যানেলে সেটিংস সেকশন, রেট সেকশন,এই দুইটা সেকশন এর ভিতরের সেভ করা বা সাবমিট করা যে বাটন গুলো আছে সবগুলা ছাড়া কোন কালার নেই
এক একটা বাটন এক একটা কালার দিবে
তোমার মন মতো তুমি দিয়ে দিও কালার এডমিন প্যানেলে আরো কোন সেকশনের বাটন ভালো কিছু কালার যদি না থাকে সবগুলো দেখে দিয়ে দিও

acceptanceCriteria: In System Settings, the Save buttons for Branding/Labels/Notice/Admin Credentials are visually styled with clear color (not default/gray).
In Worker Rate Settings, the primary 'Add' button is visually styled with clear color (not default/gray).
At least one primary action button in each admin section that includes a Save/Submit/Add action uses a colored style that is consistent and readable on light backgrounds.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources); only compose/extend via props/className in feature components.

Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
No backend (Motoko) changes are required for this UI-only update.
nonGoals: Changing the underlying data model, storage schema, or backend canister logic.
Adding new admin sections/features beyond styling and sizing updates.
Translating existing Bengali UI text into English (only this build request is written in English).
